description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Modern art "Dokumenta" show in Kassel; 7th International Printing and Paper Fair in Dusseldorf; German armed forces and NATO alliance; Germany's first school of tropical agriculture and the first German National Park in Bavarian woods; the death of Wernher Von Braun; Woman balloonists organise a free balloon race in Westphalia.
